TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptMethodAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptMethodAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptMethodAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定用于调用方法的 HTTP 谓词以及响应的格式。

span.span: Specifies which HTTP verb is used to invoke a method, and the format of the response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可从客户端脚本中调用的方法的信息。This attribute is used to specify information for methods that can be called from client script. 特性允许指定 (GET 或 POST) 可用于调用方法的 HTTP 谓词。The attribute lets you specify which HTTP verb (GET or POST) can be used to invoke a method. 它还允许你通过使用 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 或 XML 来指定是否设置响应的格式。It also lets you specify whether the response is formatted by using either JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) or XML. 属性是可选项。The attribute is optional. 但是 (，可以从客户端脚本调用的方法必须 应用属性。 ) 。(However, methods that can be called from client script must have the attribute applied.). 如果未用标记方法 ，则将使用 HTTP POST 命令调用方法，并且响应将序列化为 JSON。If a method is not marked with , the method will be called by using the HTTP POST command and the response will be serialized as JSON. 不能从脚本中覆盖此设置。You cannot override this setting from script. 仅采用命名参数。 takes only named parameters. 下面是 可用作命名参数的类的属性：The following are the properties of the class that can be used as named parameters: - 指定是否将使用 HTTP GET 命令调用方法。Specifies whether the method will be invoked by using the HTTP GET command. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用 敏感数据或事务，则将属性设置为 `true` 可能会给应用程序带来安全风险。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求中，浏览器将消息编码到 URL 中，因此更易于进行篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. 对于 GET 和 POST 请求，应遵循安全准则来保护敏感数据。For both GET and POST requests, you should follow security guidelines to protect sensitive data. - 指定是否将响应序列化为 JSON 或 XML。Specifies whether the response will be serialized as JSON or as XML. 默认值为 `Json`。The default is `Json`. 当方法返回或对象时，属性在指定 XML 作为返回类型时非常有用 。The property is useful to specify XML as the return type when the method returns an or an object. - 指定是否所有返回类型（包括字符串类型）都序列化为 XML。Specifies whether all return types, including string types, are serialized as XML. 当响应序列化为 JSON 时，属性的值将被忽略。The value of the property is ignored when the response is serialized as JSON. 有关如何使用特性的详细信息，请参阅[特性](/dotnet/standard/attributes/)。For more information about how to use attributes, see [Attributes](/dotnet/standard/attributes/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用于 `GetXmlDocument` 和方法， `EchoStringAndDate` 以指定要使用的 HTTP 谓词，并指定响应格式。The following example shows how to apply to the `GetXmlDocument` and `EchoStringAndDate` methods to specify which HTTP verb to use and to specify the response format.

summary.span: 获取或设置方法响应的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format of the method response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要将 XML 指定为返回类型的格式，请使用属性。Use the property when you want to specify XML as the format for the return type. 当方法返回或对象时，这非常有用 。This is useful when the method returns an or an object. 当 属性设置为时 `Xml` ，不会忽略应用了属性的返回类型的公共字段和属性 。When the property is set to `Xml`, the public fields and properties of the return type that have the attribute applied will not be ignored. 这是因为将使用 对象而不是对象对其进行序列化 。This is because they will be serialized by using the object instead of the object. 必须应用属性， 使其成为 返回类型的 "忽略" 或 "跳过" 公共字段和属性。You must apply the attribute to make ignore, or skip, those public fields and properties of the return type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将特性应用于将 属性设置为的 Web 方法 `Xml` 。The following example shows how to apply the attribute to a Web method with the property set to `Xml`. 方法的返回值将序列化为 XML，并作为类型的对象发送到成功的回调函数 。The return value of the method will be serialized as XML and sent to the succeeded callback function as an object of type . 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否通过使用 HTTP GET 调用方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to invoke the method by using HTTP GET.

value.span: 如果通过使用 HTTP GET 命令调用方法，则为 ；如果通过使用 HTTP POST 命令调用方法，则为 。

span.span: if the method is invoked by using the HTTP GET command; if the method is invoked by using the HTTP POST command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能在客户端上 (JavaScript) 中覆盖此属性。You cannot override this property from ECMAScript (JavaScript) on the client. 如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则从脚本调用方法将始终使用 HTTP GET。If this property is set to `true`, invoking the method from script will always use HTTP GET. 当此属性设置为时 `true` ，客户端代理代码使用 HTTP GET 来调用 Web 服务。When this property is set to `true`, the client proxy code uses HTTP GET to call the Web service. 该方法的每个输入参数都在用于调用 Web 方法的 URL 中显示为查询参数。Each input parameter for the method appears as a query parameter in the URL that is used to invoke the Web method. 参数值是通过 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 参数值的序列化和 URL 编码获取的。The parameter value is obtained through JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) serialization and URL encoding of the parameter value. 对于任何其他 Web 交互，使用 HTTP GET 来调用 Web 服务方法遵循相同的准则。The use of HTTP GET for invoking the Web service method follows the same guidelines for any other Web interaction. HTTP GET 应仅用于未公开敏感数据的操作以及服务器操作不具有副作用的操作。HTTP GET should be used only for operations where no sensitive data is exposed and when the server action does not have side effects. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果使用 敏感数据或事务，则将属性设置为 `true` 可能会给应用程序带来安全风险。Setting the property to `true` might pose a security risk for your application if you are working with sensitive data or transactions. 在 GET 请求中，浏览器将消息编码到 URL 中，因此更易于进行篡改。In GET requests, the message is encoded by the browser into the URL and is therefore an easier target for tampering. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用 到 属性设置为的 Web 方法 `true` 。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否将所有返回类型都序列化为包含字符串类型的 XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether all return types are serialized as XML, which includes string types.

value.span: 如果所有返回类型都序列化为 XML，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all return types are serialized as XML; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为 `false` ，则所有返回类型将序列化为 xml，字符串除外，它被解释为 xml 标记。When this property is set to `false`, all return types are serialized as XML, except string, which is interpreted as XML markup. 如果值为 `false` ，并且返回类型为字符串，并且字符串不包含与格式正确的 xml 文档对应的 xml 标记，则将调用成功的回调函数，但生成的序列化字符串将为 `null` 。If the value is `false`, and if the return type is a string, and if the string does not contain XML markup that corresponds to a well-formed XML document, the succeeded callback function will be invoked but the resulting serialized string will be `null`. 当属性设置为时，将忽略的值 `Json` 。The value of is ignored when the property is set to `Json`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将应用 到 属性设置为的 Web 方法 `true` 。The following example shows how to apply to a Web method with the property set to `true`. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
